So you want The Memorial Tournament Picks? We've got them. 

Whilst our golf model is being finished, we collate and filter the best picks out there. Like a ***Refinery*** should. 

Our favourite resources are **[DataGolf ](https://datagolf.com/)**and the professional pickers at both Betfairs.

- - -

## **The Memorial Tournament Course**

As you'd know, the PGA Tour is using the same deck as last week's **[Workday Charity Open](betrefinery.com/golf-betting/workday-charity-open-picks)**. The Muirfield Village Golf Club.

The result last week? Collin Morikawa edges Justin Thomas in playoff to win. Interestingly, our in-progress golf model had Collin Morikawa ranked 16 before the tournament. And JT as the third best golfer on the planet (after Rory and Rahm).

Nevertheless, the deck suits driving accuracy and irons according to DataGolf:

![golf picks](/images/uploads/muirfield-course-for-golf-picks.png "the memorial tournament picks")
